reviewText: Shop around and you will see this set generally sells for around $32. Any one of the movies easily sells for $9.99. The movies themselves are all great. "Home Alone" most people are familiar with Macauley Caulkin causing havoc on burglars. In "Jingle All the Way", Arnold Schwarzenegger goes nuts trying to buy a kid a hot new toy. George C. Scott is excellent as Ebenezer Scrooge in another version of "A Christmas Carol". The remake of "Miracle on 34th Street" is good as well. I had two of these but for this price I bought the set so I could get the other two and then give two away or donate two to a good cause.

"Runaway Jury" does justice to John Grisham's best-selling novel and they did a good job with casting, directing and acting.  Good quality DVD.  This is the best movie of the four in Legal Legends Collection Box Set.  I would rate "Runaway Jury" ***** and next time would only purchase "Runaway Jury".

"The Verdict" I didn't finish viewing the movie, I would rate it * because of Paul Newman's overacting--it became tedious watching him "drunk"--I have resold this DVD.

"Class Action" I would rate ****; Gene Hackman is excellent and it was an interesting movie although there were few surprises in the plot.

"Compulsion" I have not had a chance to view yet--will rate in the future.

This is a great bargain. Don't get me wrong! I would buy this again if it got lost. Can't beat the price for 4 good Christmas flicks.

Although I do wish they had included a newer edition of HOME ALONE in here. This one is the older letterboxed edition that is not enhanced for widescreen TVs. If your DVD player/TV/projector has the picture zoom option like mine, you can escape the problem with the black frame all around the picture on a widescreen TV, but the resolution/picture quality is still poor, of course.

JINGLE ALL THE WAY was the same thing, despite the deceptive cover which stated that the movie on the DVD was included in both Full Frame and Anamorphic Widescreen versions. Not so! The same crippled leterboxed frame.

No complaints about either the MIRACLE ON 34TH STREET, which is presented here in beautiful Anamorphic Widescreen, or A CHRISTMAS CAROL, which, as a made for TV movie, is presented in Full Frame, maintaining the original aspect ratio.

All in all, a great deal for the money.

I bought this box set for my friend's children as a Christmas present.  I really just wanted to send "Home Alone," but it came with all the other films too, which was a bonus.

My friend and her family moved from California to Massachussets last year.  The kids (age 4 and 6) were very entertained when they saw Governor Arnold acting in the Christmas movie "Jingle All the Way."  It was a big hit and reminded them of home in California. Plus it entertained the parents too.  An unexpected bonus, and a great story to tell, don't you think?

"Home Alone" reminded them of their visit to see us in Chicago a year and a half ago.  That was my intent in sending that movie to them.

"Miracle on 34th Street" reminded them of when we all went to New York City last spring when we went to visit their Massachussets home.

Although my review is unusual to say the least, it was a very meaningful Christmas present to the kids since the box set highlighted all of the places we have visited together over the past year.  I am sure that is not what you intended when you put the set together, but it was a really great gift.  Thank you!
Fabulous value! The home alone movie was a great movie to be included in this box set along with the classics!

This set is a real sleeper that can fit into every home. The iconic fame of "Home Alone" among kids is no secret, but at least one  other movie makes the set worth buying. "Miracle on 34th Street", the only remake IMHO ever done better than the original, is a beautiful tapestry of uplifting story, touching script, great cast, and magnificent cinematography. It's my favorite contemporary Christmas movie. "Christmas Carol" with George C. Scott was well made, but it's hard to supplant the sentimental older favorites with Reginald Owen and Allistair Sim. "Jingle All the Way" with Arnold Schwarzenegger had a great message, but seemed to lack holiday atmosphere. Not bad, though, as a filler item. Overall, a set well worth the money.
Good product n price.

Now we enjoy sharing them with our teen children.  Family time is precious, and it is such a joy to be able to enjoy the holidays snuggling together & reminiscing.

But other than that the movies work great and we are enjoying watching them!

Great collection at a good price. If you like legal drama and courtroom antics...THIS collection is for YOU ! How can you miss with actors like Lawrence Fishburn, Nicolas Cage, Gene Hackman, Paul Newman, and Milo O'Shea ??? Now I ask you.........!
wow. you get 4 movies in one pack for Christmas. and under $8. this is a good deal. i seen all before. and glad to have it on dvd not my old vhs. i still keep.
I like the bundle thing that it provides while I cook Christmans dinner I can watch this DVD. Very good product.
Three great and one good Christmas movie all in a box set. If you enjoy watching Christmas movies during the season you can't go wrong with this quartet.
we loved these movies. we purchased them for a women's dorm video library and they are used every Christmas season.
Bought it for "Home Alone" to replace a VCR tape. The other 3 movies were just bonuses. Not disappointed at all in my purchase.

Nice selection of some truly heart-warming holiday films that will not only give you a chuckle but also take you back with a couple of classics.  Miracle on 34th Street is a classic and a holiday must and has been around since films first came out.  Well worth the money for so much 'feel-good' in four wonderfully enjoyable movies that is good for all members of the family, young and old alike.  They make you wanna put up the tree and hang the stockings!

We bought this to watch with our kids and it's just been ok.  We thought Home Alone was funnier as we watched it when we were younger, but watching it with the kids it really wasn't.  And they really didn't like A Christmas Carol--too scary.  We'll probably just sell it next year.
I like to watch court scenes: JAG, etc.  Here I got several different ones and enjoyed them all.  Thank all.
I bought this for my ex for Christmas and he loved it. Can't beat the price for a 4 in 1 movie.
I was so happy to see all of my favorite Christmas classics in one set for a great price! Would have preferred plastic cases though over the paper/cardboard.

4 great movies at a super low price.  I have been wanting Home Alone for some time now and even to purchase that at the cheapest this past Christmas it was $9.99.  My entire family enjoyed watching Home Alone along with some other Christmas fav's with this box set!
good value pack enough said. each movie is decent quality and all together made a great stocking stuffer for the family.

I was looking for Miracle on 34th Street and A Christmas Carol and found this set, which was cheaper than getting the 2 movies separately.  Home Alone is a classic and I've always enjoyed watching it.  Jingle All The Way is a bonus, but not one of my favorites, in fact I haven't watched it yet and I've had it for over a year.  I do like the boxed sets.
Good variety in this boxed set.  Something for everyone.  Nice set for a gift or to keep for your movie library.
I bought this pack of movies for my wife last Christmas.  She absolutely loves the assortment.  We make these movies a tradition in my house now.
I love all of these movies.  They are all classics and this a very great value to get all four of them in one set.  You can't go wrong!

This is a great set of Christmas movies, they come in a small box and each movie comes in a slim case of it's own. This set is a good mix of new and older movies along with funny and classic movies. A sure buy to complete your Christmas collection.
This is a great collection of movies!  We watched these movies over Christmas break and love them!  Great price on Amazon as well!

Bought this over Christmas for the wife for about 10 dollars cheaper than Walmart was selling it for. The only thing that would make this set better would be if it included home alone 1 rather than just the second movie.
Some of the best holiday movies all in one box set. Nice mix of two comedies and two dramas. Great price.
The product was in perfect condition & arrived quickly. I'm completely satisfied with the service I got.

I ordered this for Christmas and it arrived on time and in great condition.
Thanks Amazon...
This was a great buy.  My sister wanted some christmas movies for christmas, so this was a perfect buy!

These are wonderful movies which are also appropriate for older children.  Jingle All The Way must be one of Arnold's worst flicks, but younger kids seemed to enjoy it.  A Christmas Carol I don't suggest for the little ones, plot and themes are just a bit beyond thier grasp. Overall there is something for everyone, so I do recommend this 4-for-1 bargain.
I love bringing these movies out after Thanksgiving.  The set was a great deal.
